items.title: Tim Cook did something he hasn’t done before — buy Nike’s stock on the open market
items.description: Apple CEO and Nike board member Tim Cook spent nearly $3 million to buy Nike’s stock after the latest selloff, roughly doubling his stake in the compa...

items.title: America’s food market is rigged. Look who’s getting rich while many of us struggle with grocery bills
items.description: Powerful “Big Ag” — not small farmers and ranchers or even tariffs — is the root cause of the food-affordability crisis.

items.title: One of the most important ‘Magnificent Seven’ members is rumbling to life. Here’s what that means for tech and the S&P 500.
items.description: Nvidia shares have been on a run lately and strategist Mark Newton says that has bigger meaning for the stock market in general.

items.title: Precious metals have been on a heated pre-holiday run. Why this strategist is calling that ‘unhinged.’
items.description: The run-up to the year-end holiday period has come with big gains for precious metals, but one UBS strategist says investor beware.

items.title: Life is cheap this Christmas
items.description: You can restore a starving infant to health for about $40.
